articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
articles.title: US issues first ever fine for space junk to Dish Network - BBC
articles.description: Dish Network will have to pay $150,000 for failing to move an old satellite far enough away from the Earth.
articles.content:
The US government has issued its first ever fine to a company for leaving space junk orbiting the Earth.
The Federal Communications Commission fined Dish Network $150,000 (£125,000) for failing to m… [+2625 chars]
